prerequisite: Students would need to fully acquire the concepts in MUT1122 and pass the module before they go on to take MUT2117.
moduleDescription: Continuation in counterpoint studies. The module includes analysis and composition of two- and three-voice Baroque-style pieces, including fugue.
faculty: YONG SIEW TOH CONSERVATORY OF MUSIC
department: YONG SIEW TOH CONSERVATORY OF MUSIC
